thread.title: Pat V
thread.title_full: Warrior Trading reviewed by Pat V

author: Pat V
title: Pat V
text:
I have been in the Warriortrading room since 2015 and I learn every day new things. Although I can't join every day the chat room, I learn in weekend and evening hours all that is available as Warrior trading Pro student.
You don't need many trades to be profitable. I didn't trade at all since 1 Jan 2017 but today was a home run with an 8000 $ gain. This puts me up 72 % since I joined WT family. And I still want to learn Options and Swingtrading this year. I want to have multiple knifes to scalp money out of the market )))
Thanks WT family !! Look forward to learn a lot more.
A dedicated student from Belgium
